packages
```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(neonUtilities) ; library(dplyr) ; library(lubridate) ; library(tidyr)
options(stringsAsFactors=F) # character variables are not converted to factors
```

Relative abundance by Division
```{r}

#bring sites from the sties_list.csv file 
sites = read.csv("/Volumes/Research/EcosystemEcologyLab/MSAPLANKTONdataDirectory/DataInDevelopment/NEONData/sites_list.csv",header =F)
sites = as.list(sites[,1])

results_matrix = as.data.frame(matrix(nrow = 0 , ncol = 5))    
colnames(results_matrix) = c("algalSampleType","collectDate","division","relabun", "site")


for (i in 1:length(sites)) {

site = sites[i]
 


division_tax = read.csv(paste("/Volumes/Research/EcosystemEcologyLab/MSAPLANKTONdataDirectory/DataInDevelopment/NEONData/",site,"/04_product/division_taxonomy_subset.csv",sep=""))

division_tax_temp = division_tax %>%
  group_by(algalSampleType,sampleID) %>%
  mutate(sum_count = sum(algalCountPermL)) %>% #sum per date/sample
  
      group_by(algalSampleType,sampleID,division) %>%
      mutate(relabun = algalCountPermL/sum_count,site = print(site)) %>%
      select("algalSampleType","collectDate","division","relabun", "site")
  


division_tax_temp = as.data.frame(division_tax_temp)
results_matrix = rbind(results_matrix,division_tax_temp)

}

results_matrix <- apply(results_matrix,2,as.character)

write.csv(results_matrix, 
          paste("/Volumes/Research/EcosystemEcologyLab/MSAPLANKTONdataDirectory/DataInDevelopment/Aggregations/AggregatedNEONdata/01_input/division_relabun_perSite&Date&replicate.csv",sep=""))




```

Standarized HI and FI indices
```{r}

#bring sites from the sties_list.csv file 
indices_raw = read.table("clipboard", header=T,sep="\t")
  
indices_std = indices_raw %>%
  group_by(site) %>%
  mutate(standardized_HI = (meanHI.Chl - mean(meanHI.Chl)) / sd(meanHI.Chl),
         standardized_FI = (meanFI.Chl - mean(meanFI.Chl)) / sd(meanFI.Chl))

write.csv(indices_std, "/Volumes/Research/EcosystemEcologyLab/MSAPLANKTONdataDirectory/DataInDevelopment/Aggregations/AggregatedNEONdata/02_protocol/NeonDataAnalysis/indices_std.csv")



```
